titles.title: Federal Financial Assistance Management Improvement Act of 2009
Federal Financial Assistance Management Improvement Act of 2009
A bill to reauthorize and improve the Federal Financial Assistance Management Improvement Act of 1999.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S789)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs.

calendar.text: Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.

action.text: Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs. Reported by Senator Lieberman without amendment. With written report No. 111-7.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 30.

committee.name: Senate Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs
